mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID AS TASTE_CD, TASTE AS TASTE_NM, EAT_AMT FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_CODE_M WHERE CODE_TP = 'CHICKEN') CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT TASTE_CD, count(*) AS EAT_AMT FROM TB_CHICKEN_CONSUME_HIS WHERE CONSUMER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY TASTE_CD) CHICKEN_HIS ON CODE.CODE_ID = CHICKEN_HIS.TASTE_CD ORDER BY TASTE_CD

SELECT HIS.TASTE_CD, CODE.TASTE AS TASTE_NM, DATE_FORMAT(HIS.CRE_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS EAT_DTM FROM TB_CHICKEN_CONSUME_HIS HIS LEFT JOIN TB_CODE_M CODE ON HIS.TASTE_CD = CODE.CODE_ID WHERE CONSUMER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY HIS.CRE_DTM DESC
